content:
From: Jørgen Villadsen <jovi@dtu.dk>
Hi,

For your information, next year I give the following introductory course:

Natural Deduction and the Isabelle Proof Assistant,
European Summer School in Logic, Language, and Information (ESSLLI),
17-28 July 2017, Toulouse, France

https://www.irit.fr/esslli2017/courses/24.html

Regards,

Jørgen
